name: Free My Desktop
description: Quickly hide and show your desktop, dock and menubar. Make your screens and recordings look great. For free.

name: Endless Wheel
description: Build your own strategy to get as many pins into the wheel as you can.

name: Tickery
description: Tickery allows you to check the buy and sell price of many currencies.

name: Minimal Counter
description: The best way to count pretty much anything on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch. Fully customizable. For Free!

name: SWTOR Discipline and Utilities Calculator
description: Explore your discipline and utilities and save custom presets.

name: County - Event Countdown
description: Count the time left before your next big day!

name: IPLocation / IPLocation Mini
description: Check the location of your IP address and get notified you each time your IP address changes!

name: FaceBlur - Automatically Blur Faces in an Image
description: Blurring Faces in an image has never been easier! You no longer need to manually tap each and every face, with FaceBlur you just select the picture and the app does the rest.

name: CryptoChecker
description: CryptoChecker allows you to check the price of more than 700 Cryptocurrencies in a glance, from on your iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch.

name: Cooking Timer
description: Minimal Countdown timer for all your cooking needs (and much else).

name: DogeChecker
description:
DogeChecker is a simple app to check the current Dogecoin price in a glance.
From a shibe, to a shibe.

name: LiteChecker
description: LiteChecker is a simple app to check the current Litecoin price in a second. [Lite Version without Apple Watch support also available.]

name: BlackChecker
description: BlackChecker is a simple app to check the current Blackcoin price in a moment. [Lite Version without Apple Watch support also available.]

name: Tic Tac Toe Apple Watch Edition
description: The old classic Tic Tac Toe that you know and love, now for Apple Watch! [Also available for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.]

name: Random Password Generator
description: Generate a Random Password on iOS or a PIN on Apple Watch.

name: Translatory
description: Translate everything in more than 50 languages.

name: QRCodePal
description: Generate, Read and Share QRCodes without effort.

name: Percentage Change Calculator
description: Quickly Calculate the Percentage Change of any price.

name: Ary - The Meme Explorer
description: Get the latest memes directly on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch.
